reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress visually appealing, with many noting it looks expensive and one mentioning its pretty pattern. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, comfort, and quality, with one customer noting it doesn't feel cheap or see-through. They appreciate its vibrant colors, particularly the dark green shade, and find it flattering for various body types, with one highlighting its a-line smocking design. The material is praised for being thick and made of velvet, though opinions about the length are mixed - while some find it good, others say it's too long for those under 5'1". items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice holiday dress!
items.body: I haven't worn this yet, but it fits and seems super comfy, yet elegant. Hoping to wear it for a holiday party and can also dress it down a bit with a jean jacket for other occasions. Fabric is nice and I like the amber color of this velvet. I wear a size 4 and the Small size is accurate. Could be a little snugger/fitted, but can always wear a belt. Read more
items.author: JullieB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Everyday Maxi Dress
items.body: I ordered this dress in two different colors and absolutely love both of them. It’s long, very comfortable, and surprisingly flattering on my body type. I’m 5’9 and larger-chested, and it fits great everywhere with no awkward pulling or tight spots. I especially love the sleeve coverage — they’re flowy without being restrictive, which makes it perfect for staying comfortable while still looking polished. The material is soft and breathable and not hot at all, even in Arizona summer weather. I wash it in the machine and hang dry all of my dresses, and this one has held up really well through multiple washes with no issues. Overall, it’s a great quality dress that’s both comfortable and stylish. I would definitely buy more colors! Read more
items.author: CMS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Being Beautiful is Priceless
items.body: BEAUTIFUL I was, many said at my nephew's wedding in October as they pointed out the dress I was wearing. I LOVE THIS DRESS! Super HAPPY with my purchase! The dress itself is velvet, stretchy, moveable, and comfortable, it did not disappoint! I wore the size large, fit me (12-14). There was a little weight to the dress but I liked knowing it wasn't flimsy. I would highly recommend this to anyone else because like I said, I received many compliments in my dress, not only the deep color of pine green, but how it shapes your figure. I have no complaints with this dress, and can't wait to wear it again next fall! Read more
items.author: K. Rademacher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, flattering
items.body: Perfect, from casual to dressy Soft, breathable material Flattering fit Read more
items.author: April

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shorter than expected, but flattering cut
items.body: Very comfortable and made with good material. I wore this as a bridesmaid dress for my brother’s wedding and I’m excited to be able to be able to wear it again for other occasions. I’m 5’ 10” and 200lbs. While it wasn’t as long as I expected, the cut was very flattering while still being elegant. Additionally, even though it’s made with velvet, the liner was silky and comfortable and the flowy style kept it from being too hot. I tend to be self-conscious about how big my arms are, so I really liked the loose fitting longer short sleeves. Overall, very satisfied. Read more
items.author: Sandy Lasley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGH QUALITY FOR CHEAP
items.body: BUY IT! the dress is beautiful, great quality and exactly as pictured, true to size, can't beat the price, its comfortable, stretchy and the cut off the neck line is so flattering Read more
items.author: Misty White

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as pretty as the picture
items.body: I love this dress! It is very comfortable, and the color is beautiful. I am excited to wear it for an upcoming work party. It is flattering with my menopause belly. The size is true to my size. Read more
items.author: Kelle Van Zandt

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: It's comfortable and fits well. I bought a large and wear a size 8/10 but I have a large chest 38dd. So the large fits fine. The material is a bit cheap feeling but overall its light weight and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Dawn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Maxi Short Sleeve Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Maxi Short Sleeve Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Maxi Short Sleeve Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C-army Green, A-blue Purple, A-burgundy, T-dusty Blue, C-lake Blue, C-wine Red, A-beige, T-army Green, A-emerald Green, Burnout-emerald Green, C-black, Burnout-black, Burnout-rust, C-earthy Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
